name: Sullen Day
description:
Sullen Day is a short atmospheric story game with elements of horror and mysticism.

  

The action game takes place in 1987, where the player has to move through several different events and understand what happened. Not immediately understandable story, the idea of which is revealed gradually as it passes only increases the gloomy atmosphere of the game.  

  

You need to follow simple steps to move on, but it is mostly about exploring the objects and events around you. Storytelling done with notes and phrases. 

  

Play with mouse and keyboard.

  

Play time is around 15 to 25 minutes, depending on your play-style.

  • Move - WASD
  • Interact - F
  • Crouch/Stand - Ctrl
  • Zoom In / Out - Right Mouse Button
  • Run - Shift
  • GeForce GT 1030, or equivalent/faster graphics card.
  • Quad-core processor, 2.5GHz or faster.
  • 4Gb RAM or more.
  • Windows 7 or later.
